div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 47 Piraeus, 1882 (817) Burial: c. 400-380 B.C. (Regling) Contents: c. 80 EL. Pot hoard Cyzicus: st. Disposition: unknown Greenwell, NC 1887, p. 42 (a handwritten note in Greenwell's copy of the article raises the total to 80 and adds that no Alexander, were in the hd.) Regling, ZfN 1931, p. 26
